DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to obtain data on the safety and efficacy of Ultravist application in usual daily use.The radiologist will administer the contrast medium to the patient as he/she would have done without the study. No other examinations will be performed than would have been done routinely.
DOC.brief_title: PMS Study Ultravist-IMAGE, IoproMide (UltrAvist) to Gain Further Information on Tolerability and Safety in X-ray Examination
DOC.criteria: Patients with indication for an Xray examination and for whom the radiologist has decided to use the contrast medium Ultravist. No exclusion criteria besides the contraindications for the use of Ultravist as mentioned in the product information.
